metadata.feature_description: Retrieve and save page settings including metadata, appearance, and permissions

steps.expected: Pages panel should load with page tree visible
steps.actual: Pages panel loaded successfully showing all site pages in tree structure

steps.action: Click on 'Our Products' page in the tree
steps.expected: Page details should load showing Page ID, name, title, description, and all metadata
steps.actual: Page details loaded correctly showing Page ID: 22, Created date: 2/9/2026 by System, Status: Visible, with all fields populated

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Save page details with all fields

steps.action: Modify the Title field from 'Our Products - Cavalier Electronics' to 'Our Products - Cavalier Electronics Updated'
steps.expected: Title field should be editable and Save button should become enabled
steps.actual: Title field was modified and Save button became enabled with 'Changes have not been saved' message

steps.expected: Page should save successfully with confirmation message
steps.actual: Page saved successfully with 'Page updated successfully' notification message

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test page type changes - URL type

steps.action: Select 'URL Type Test Page' from the pages list
steps.expected: Page details should load with Page Type options visible (Standard, Existing, URL, File)
steps.actual: Page details loaded with Page ID: 70 and Page Type options visible showing Standard, Existing, URL, File

steps.expected: UI should change to show URL-specific fields
steps.actual: UI changed to show URL textbox, Permanent Redirect toggle, and Open Link In New Window toggle

steps.expected: Page should save with URL type configuration
steps.actual: Page saved successfully with URL type. Page icon in tree changed to indicate URL type

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test page type changes - Existing type

steps.expected: UI should change to show existing page selector dropdown
steps.actual: UI changed to show 'Existing Page' dropdown with '<< None Specified >>' option, plus Permanent Redirect and Open Link In New Window toggles

steps.action: Click on Workflow dropdown in page details
steps.actual: Dropdown opened showing 5 workflows: Direct Publish, Save Draft, Content Approval, Test Workflow, Test & <> "Special" Chars!

steps.expected: Workflow should change and page should be marked as having unsaved changes
steps.actual: Workflow changed to 'Content Approval' with 'Changes have not been saved' message displayed

steps.action: Select Home page and navigate to Advanced > More tab
steps.expected: Security settings including 'Disable Page' toggle should be visible
steps.actual: More tab displayed Security section with 'Secure Connection' and 'Disable Page' toggles, plus Cache Settings section

steps.action: Verify Disable Page toggle exists and can be toggled
steps.expected: Disable Page toggle should be interactive
steps.actual: Disable Page toggle is present with Off state and info tooltip. Feature exists in UI matching PageSettings.DisableLink property

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test permission checks for page management

steps.action: Click on Permissions tab for Home page
steps.expected: Permissions grid should display with role-based and user-based permissions
steps.actual: Permissions tab displayed showing PERMISSIONS BY ROLE grid with columns: View, Add, Content, Copy, Delete, Export, Import, Manage, Navigate, Edit Tab. Roles displayed: Administrators, Content Editors, Content Managers, Everyone, Registered Users. PERMISSIONS BY USER section also available with Add user functionality

steps.action: View Home page Details tab with Enable Scheduling toggle
steps.expected: Scheduling feature should be visible with Start Date and End Date options
steps.actual: Enable Scheduling toggle was ON for Home page, showing Start Date (02/09/2026 09:30 PM) and End Date fields with date picker calendar UI

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edge case - XSS protection in page names

steps.action: Verify page with XSS script in name is properly escaped
steps.expected: Script tags should be HTML-encoded and not executed
steps.actual: Page named '<script>alert('XSS')</script>' is visible in tree, properly HTML-encoded. No script execution occurs

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Edge case - Long page name handling

steps.action: Verify page with very long name is handled correctly
steps.expected: Long page name should be displayed, possibly truncated in UI
steps.actual: Page with name 'This is a very long page name to test the field length validation. This name is intentionally made extremely long to see if the system properly validates and rejects page names that exceed the maximum' is visible in tree and selectable

observations: The Page Details UI provides three main tabs: Details, Permissions, and Advanced (with sub-tabs: Modules, Appearance, S.E.O., More)
All four page types (Standard, Existing, URL, File) are supported with appropriate UI fields for each type
Workflow dropdown shows all available workflows including those with special characters in names
Permissions tab provides comprehensive role-based access control with 10 different permission types
Page scheduling feature supports both Start Date and End Date with full date-time picker
The system properly handles XSS attempts by HTML-encoding special characters in page names
Very long page names are supported and displayed in the tree (may truncate for display purposes)
Cancel button properly prompts for confirmation when there are unsaved changes
The 'Disable Page' feature (DisableLink) is located under Advanced > More > Security section
Cache Settings available under Advanced > More tab with Output Cache Provider dropdown
